content:
In the Turunchuk River, 22-year-old Odessa was stuck, planning to move the border illegally to Moldova.

About thisShe reported March 26State Border Service of Ukraine.

According to border guards, information about a guy who cannot get out of the cold water of the Turunchuk River was provided by a local resident.

Having overcome the willow and reeds, the border guards managed to help the guy. The doctors stated the victim of severe degree of hypothermia and frostbite.

It was later revealed that after Turunchuk, the guy also planned to overcome the Dniester, which is much more high -water. Apparently, the evidenceman taught geography poorly.

Asreported the armyinform, in Transcarpathia, two groups of evidence were stopped.
title: Odessa snorted from Odessa in the river with frostbite
description: This was reported on March 26 by the State Border Service of Ukraine. According to...
author: Army Inform
